propertyDefinitionSteps.name: SQL statement

batch.labelHint: Use prepared statements for INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE in order to update multiple rows with batch update.

query.labelHint: SQL statement to be executed. Can contain input parameters prefixed by ':#'.

actions.description: Send messages to the email account that this connection is authorized to access.

propertyDefinitionSteps.description: Specify the email messages that you want to send.
propertyDefinitionSteps.name: Send messages to Email

bcc.label: producer
bcc.labelHint: One or more comma-separated email addresses to send a blind copy of the email to.

cc.label: producer
cc.labelHint: One or more comma-separated email addresses to send a copy of the email to.

from.label: producer
from.labelHint: Email address of the sender (must be valid email address to avoid sender verification failure)

priority.label: producer
priority.labelHint: Whether the input values above or the consumed data gets priority in being applied to the generated emails

subject.label: producer
subject.labelHint: The text to insert in the subject line of the email.

text.label: producer
text.labelHint: The email message that you want to send.

to.label: producer
to.labelHint: One or more comma-separated email addresses to send the email to.

actions.name: Send Email

host.description: The hostname of the email server.
host.label: common

password.label: common,security
password.labelHint: Specify the password for the email account that this connection is authorized to access.

port.description: The port of the email server.
port.label: common

secureType.label: security
secureType.labelHint: Specify what security protocol (if any) the connection requires

serverCertificate.description: If the SSL email server is internal and possesses a self-signed certificate then enable SSL by adding the certificate here.
serverCertificate.label: common,security

username.label: common,security
username.labelHint: Specify the user name for the email account that this connection is authorized to access.

actions.description: Start an integration from a Webhook

contextPath.description: The Webhook token that will be set as final part of the URL

errorResponseCodes.description: The return code to set according to different error situations
errorResponseCodes.extendedProperties: { "mapsetValueDefinition": {   "enum" : [{"label":"400 Bad Request","value":"400"},{"label":"404 Not Found","value":"404"},{"label":"405 Method Not Allowed","value":"405"},{"label":"409 Conflict","value":"409"},{"label":"500 Server Error","value":"500"},{"label":"501 Not Implemented","value":"501"},{"label":"503 Service Unavailable","value":"503"}],    "type" : "select" },"mapsetOptions": {    "i18nKeyColumnTitle": "When the error message is",    "i18nValueColumnTitle": "Return this HTTP response code" }}

httpResponseCode.description: The return code to set in the HTTP response

returnBody.displayName: Include error message in the return body

outputDataShape.name: Template JSON Schema
outputDataShape.specification: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/schema#","title":"Template JSON Schema","type":"object","properties":{"first_name":{"description":"Identifier for the symbol first_name","type":"string"},"company":{"description":"Identifier for the symbol company","type":"string"}}}

inputDataShape.name: Template JSON Schema
inputDataShape.specification: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/schema#","title":"Template JSON Schema","type":"object","properties":{"first_name":{"description":"Identifier for the symbol first_name","type":"string"},"company":{"description":"Identifier for the symbol company","type":"string"}}}

configuredProperties.template:
Welcome {{first_name}},

have a great start here at {{company}}!

Regards,
People Team
